headline: Her Doctor Abused Her. Now She Can Delete Him.
abstract: A new law in New York City lets parents remove their obstetriciansâ€™ names if their medical licenses were revoked for misconduct.
lead_paragraph: To register her twin daughters for kindergarten a few years ago, Marissa Hoechstetter needed their birth certificates. It had been quite a while since she had last looked closely at them, and when she pulled the papers out, what she saw made her stomach turn, she said.
